content: the lenzie knot is created using the overlay mosaic technique the pdf has one easy to read chart for each different design with x s for dcs and corresponding written instructions two pdf s are available - one using us terms and one using uk terms ***************************************** you can use any yarn and corresponding hook you like for this pattern just remember a tighter gauge is better for mosaic crochet if using stylecraft special dk you will need approximately 16 skeins for the main body of the blanket the blanket will be approximately 110cm x wide by 145cm tall with a simple 3-row border you can of course create any size you want as it s a simple repeating pattern ***************************************** i hope you enjoy creating your own lenzie knot - whether it s a blanket a cushion cover a scarf a wrap or anything else you can think of please do share your creations online and tag #getyerhookon and #lenzieknot happy crocheting abi
